summary: A Small Group Of Fixes For This Underused Weapon.
descriptionHtml:
I was trying to play with the Headman\'s Axe and I realised that it wasn\'t exactly useful in it\'s current bugged state.

Before:

- Was classed as a one-handed weapon even though it was two-handed.
- Had the sounds of a one-handed weapon
- Underpowered 
- Non Upgradeable
- Was called Headman\'s Axe in-game even though all resources are called Executioner\'s Axe

After:

- Now classed as a two-handed weapon 
- Has the sounds of a two-handed weapon
- Upgradeable 
- Added damage & value (slightly more powerful than an iron battleaxe)
- Enchanted (the same enchantment as Mehrune\'s Razor)
- Now called Executioner\'s Axe in-game too
 
To install either use the NMM or extract the Data folder and merge with the one in the Skyrim folder and remember to activate the .esp in the launcher.
author: Els236
